CustomField.description: ... represents the customer-facing description for a given field. This should only be used to describe fields for externalObjects, as Salesforce Object fields will carry their own field descriptions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... represents the customer-facing description for a given field. This should only be used to describe fields for externalObjects, as Salesforce Object fields will carry their own field descriptions.
CustomField.label: Field Description
